meanings.definition: A unit of computing speed equal to one trillion floating-point operations per second.
meanings.sent1: My computer can process data at a teraflop speed.
meanings.sent2: The supercomputer is capable of performing teraflops of calculations in a second.
meanings.sent3: I wish I could run as fast as a teraflop when I'm late for work!
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like a teraflop, quickly solving complex problems.
meanings.sent5: The teraflop speed of the new processor amazed everyone in the tech industry.
